TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract WebClientProtocol extends System.ComponentModel.Component
Public MustInherit Class WebClientProtocol Inherits Component
public ref class WebClientProtocol abstract : System::ComponentModel::Component

summary.span: 指定基底類別 (Base Class) 給所有使用 ASP.NET 來建立的 XML Web Service 用戶端 Proxy。

span.span: Specifies the base class for all XML Web service client proxies created using ASP.NET.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性類別用來控制用來傳輸 XML Web service 要求和回應的傳輸行為。The properties of the class are used to control the behavior of the transport used to transmit the XML Web service request and response. 這個類別上的屬性對應至屬性上找到。The properties on this class map to properties found on . 從衍生類別的執行個體，例如，做為傳輸機制使用 ASP.NET 建立 XML Web service。Instances of classes deriving from , such as , are used as the transport mechanism for XML Web services created using ASP.NET. 與 XML Web service 通訊，您必須建立 proxy 類別，衍生自的間接或直接對您想要呼叫 XML Web service。To communicate with an XML Web service, you must create a proxy class deriving indirectly or directly from for the XML Web service you want to call. 而不是以手動方式建立 proxy 類別，您可以使用 Wsdl.exe 工具來建立指定的 XML Web 服務的服務描述的 proxy 類別。Instead of creating the proxy class manually, you can use the Wsdl.exe tool to create a proxy class for a given XML Web service's service description. 因為的基底類別為您的用戶端 proxy，您會發現其屬性，在您的 proxy 類別。Since is the base class for your client proxy, you will find its properties on your proxy classes. 這些屬性可用於控制基礎傳輸的要求行為。These properties are useful for controlling the request behavior of the underlying transport. 比方說，使用呼叫的屬性驗證 XML Web service。For instance, use the property for calling authenticated XML Web services. 許多屬性用來初始化用來提出 Web 要求的物件。Many of the properties are used to initialize the object that is used to make the Web request. ## Examples 下列範例是 ASP.NET Web Form，它會呼叫名為 XML Web service `Math`。The following example is an ASP.NET Web Form, which calls an XML Web service named `Math`. 內`EnterBtn_Click`函式，Web Form 中設定 proxy 資訊和用戶端認證在遠端 XML Web service 方法的呼叫之前的 proxy 類別。Within the `EnterBtn_Click` function, the Web Form sets proxy information and client credentials on the proxy class prior to calling the remote XML Web service method. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic WebClientProtocol Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic WebClientProtocol Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic WebClientProtocol Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic WebClientProtocol Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

threadsafe.span: 此類別的內容複製到的新執行個體每個 XML Web 服務方法呼叫的物件。

span.span: The properties on this class are copied into a new instance of a object for each XML Web service method call.

threadsafe.span: 雖然您可以在同一個呼叫 XML Web service 方法執行個體從不同的執行緒，在此同時，不會有同步為了確保一致的快照集的屬性，將會傳輸到物件。

span.span: While you can call XML Web service methods on the same instance from different threads at the same time, there is no synchronization done to ensure that a consistent snapshot of the properties will get transferred to the object.

threadsafe.span: 因此如果您要修改的屬性，並進行並行方法呼叫，從不同執行緒，您應該使用不同的執行個體的 XML Web 服務 proxy，或提供您自己的同步處理。

span.span: Therefore if you need to modify the properties and make concurrent method calls from different threads you should use a different instance of the XML Web service proxy or provide your own synchronization.
Script Exploits Overview

The name of the connection group.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可讓您將相關聯連接群組的要求。The property enables you to associate a request to a connection group. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 。For more details, see .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Net::ICredentials ^ Credentials { System::Net::ICredentials ^ get(); void set(System::Net::ICredentials ^ value); };
member this.Credentials : System.Net.ICredentials with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定 XML Web Service 用戶端驗證 (Authentication) 的安全認證。

span.span: Gets or sets security credentials for XML Web service client authentication.

value.span: XML Web Service 用戶端的 。

span.span: The for the XML Web service client.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用時`Credentials`屬性，XML Web service 用戶端必須具現化類別，實作，例如，然後將設定用戶端認證特定的驗證機制。When using the `Credentials` property, a XML Web service client must instantiate a class implementing , such as , and then set the client credentials specific to the authentication mechanism. 類別可以用來設定驗證認證使用基本、 摘要式、 NTLM 和 Kerberos 驗證機制。The class can be used to set authentication credentials using the basic, digest, NTLM and Kerberos authentication mechanisms. 屬性設定為 時，用戶端會與伺服器進行交涉，根據伺服器的設定方式來決定執行 Kerberos 和/或 NTLM 驗證。When the property is set to then the client negotiates with the server to do Kerberos and/or NTLM authentication depending on how the server is configured. ## Examples 下列範例是 ASP.NET Web Form，它會呼叫名為 XML Web service `Math`。The following example is an ASP.NET Web Form, which calls an XML Web service named `Math`. 內`EnterBtn_Click`函式中，Web Form 明確地設定使用的驗證認證`Credentials`屬性。Within the `EnterBtn_Click` function, the Web Form explicitly sets authentication credentials using the `Credentials` property. 使用者名稱、 密碼和網域傳入建構函式類別。The user name, password and domain are passed into the constructor for the class. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱For more information, see. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic WebClientProtocol.Credentials Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic WebClientProtocol.Credentials Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic WebClientProtocol.Credentials Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic WebClientProtocol.Credentials Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 這個保護的 (Protected) 方法由 XML Web Service 用戶端基礎結構所呼叫，以便取得新的 傳輸物件來傳輸 XML Web Service 要求。

span.span: This protected method is called by the XML Web service client infrastructure to get a new transport object to transmit the XML Web service request.
The instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以覆寫這個方法，以自訂物件進行 XML Web service 要求之前。This method can be overridden to customize the object before the XML Web service request is made. 例如，您可以要求加入自訂標頭。For example you could add a custom header to the request.

span.span: The parameter is .

span.span: Returns a response from a request to an XML Web service method.

summary.span: 這個保護的方法由 XML Web Service 用戶端基礎結構所呼叫，以便從同步 XML Web Service 要求取得回應。

span.span: This protected method is called by the XML Web service client infrastructure to get the response from a synchronous XML Web service request.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool PreAuthenticate { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.PreAuthenticate : bool with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定是否已啟用預先驗證。

span.span: Gets or sets whether pre-authentication is enabled.

value.span: 如果要求預先驗證，則為 ，否則，即為 。

span.span: to pre-authenticate the request; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當用戶端要求的資源，而不使用認證時，伺服器會挑戰的要求，並表示它支援何種驗證配置。When a client requests a resource without using credentials, the server challenges the request and indicates what authentication schemes it supports. 用戶端選擇的驗證配置，並傳送適當`WWW-authenticate`到伺服器的標頭。The client chooses an authentication scheme and sends the appropriate `WWW-authenticate` header to the server. 當已`true`，則`WWW-authenticate`標頭傳送的所有後續的要求。When is `true`, the `WWW-authenticate` header is sent with all subsequent requests. 當是`false`，要求對 XML Web service 方法而不會一開始嘗試驗證使用者。When is `false`, a request is made to the XML Web service method without initially attempting to authenticate the user. 如果 XML Web 服務允許匿名存取，則會執行 XML Web service 方法。If the XML Web service allows anonymous access, then the XML Web service method is executed. 如果不允許匿名存取，401 HTTP 傳回碼會傳送回用戶端。If anonymous access is disallowed, a 401 HTTP return code is sent back to the client. 在回應中，類別傳回至 Web 伺服器的驗證認證。In response, the class returns authentication credentials to the Web server. 如果用戶端已驗證，及後續授權來存取 XML Web service，則會執行 XML Web service 方法;否則用戶端就會拒絕存取。If the client is authenticated and subsequently authorized to access the XML Web service, the XML Web service method is executed; otherwise the client is denied access.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Text::Encoding ^ RequestEncoding { System::Text::Encoding ^ get(); void set(System::Text::Encoding ^ value); };
member this.RequestEncoding : System.Text.Encoding with get, set

summary.span: ，用來建立對 XML Web Service 的用戶端要求。

span.span: The used to make the client request to the XML Web service.

value.span: 用戶端要求的字元編碼方式。

span.span: The character encoding for the client request.

value.span: 預設值為 ，也就是要使用基礎傳輸和通訊協定的預設編碼方式。

span.span: The default is , which uses the default encoding for the underlying transport and protocol.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 判斷要求訊息的編碼方式。The determines the encoding for the request message. 的要求將會使用註解的編碼值。The of the request will be annotated with the encoding value. 類別衍生自支援特定的通訊協定，例如沒有 SOAP，將此屬性設定為符合特定的通訊協定的編碼需求。Classes deriving from support a particular protocol, such as does for SOAP, set this property to conform to encoding requirements for the specific protocol. 比方說，設定的預設編碼為 utf-8。For example, the sets the default encoding to UTF-8. ## Examples 下列範例是 ASP.NET Web Form，它會呼叫名為 XML Web service `Math`。The following example is an ASP.NET Web Form, which calls an XML Web service named `Math`. 內`EnterBtn_Click`函式中，Web Form 明確設定 RequestEncoding 為 utf-8。Within the `EnterBtn_Click` function, the Web Form explicitly sets RequestEncoding to UTF-8. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic WebClientProtocol.RequestEncoding Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic WebClientProtocol.RequestEncoding Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic WebClientProtocol.RequestEncoding Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic WebClientProtocol.RequestEncoding Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int Timeout { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.Timeout : int with get, set

summary.span: 表示 XML Web Service 用戶端等待同步 XML Web Service 要求的回覆到達的時間 (單位為毫秒)。

span.span: Indicates the time an XML Web service client waits for the reply to a synchronous XML Web service request to arrive (in milliseconds).

value.span: 同步呼叫 XML Web Service 的逾時值，單位為毫秒。

span.span: The time out, in milliseconds, for synchronous calls to the XML Web service.
The default is 100000 milliseconds.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定屬性設指出要求不會逾時。即使將 XML Web service 用戶端可以設定屬性不會逾時，Web 伺服器仍有可能導致要求逾時的伺服器端上。Setting the property to indicates that the request does not time out. Even though an XML Web service client can set the property to not time out, the Web server can still cause the request to time out on the server side. ## Examples 下列範例會設定`Timeout`同步呼叫 15000 （15 秒） 的值`Add`內的 XML Web service 方法`Math`XML Web service。The following example sets the `Timeout` value to 15000 (15 seconds) for the synchronous call to the `Add` XML Web service method within the `Math` XML Web service. [!code-cpp[Classic WebClientProtocol.Timeout Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic WebClientProtocol.Timeout Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic WebClientProtocol.Timeout Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic WebClientProtocol.Timeout Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebClientProtocol.Timeout Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic WebClientProtocol.Timeout Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Url { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Url : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定用戶端正在要求之 XML Web Service 的基礎 URL。

span.span: Gets or sets the base URL of the XML Web service the client is requesting.

value.span: 用戶端正在要求之 XML Web Service 的基礎 URL。

span.span: The base URL of the XML Web service the client is requesting.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 Wsdl.exe 產生 proxy 類別會設定預設用戶端使用的屬性。Proxy classes generated using Wsdl.exe will set a default property for the client to use. 預設值取決於要從中產生 proxy 類別的服務描述中找到的位置屬性。The default is determined by the location attribute found in the service description from which the proxy class was generated. 衍生的類別支援特定的通訊協定，例如並可能會新增額外的資訊，讓 XML Web service 要求。Derived classes supporting specific protocols, such as and might add extra information to to make the XML Web service request. 屬性可以變更為任何實作相同的 proxy 類別所產生的服務描述的 XML Web service，請參閱。The property can be changed to refer to any XML Web service that implements the same service description that the proxy class was generated from. ## Examples 下列範例會變更屬性`math`XML Web service 的 Web 伺服器`http:// www.contoso.com`。The following example changes the property for the `math` XML Web service to the Web server named `http:// www.contoso.com`. [!code-cpp[Classic WebClientProtocol.Url Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic WebClientProtocol.Url Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic WebClientProtocol.Url Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic WebClientProtocol.Url Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebClientProtocol.Url Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic WebClientProtocol.Url Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

value.span: 如果將認證屬性設為 屬性的值，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the Credentials property is set to the value of the property; otherwise, .
